author: gakonst
content:
Is there a requirements doc for history expiry? And how we arrived to the Era file format as the format for satisyfing these requirements?

I am asking as I wonder about what should we do about clients who have implemented their own "append-only stores" for history already such as Geth's ancients, Erigon's minimal-perfect-hash-function-based static files, and Reth's new custom static files.

There's also other common archival formats which are very popular in big data world, such as Parquet or Lance, and I wonder if there was an investigation in them?

Apologies if this was asked / discussed already, happy to read up, just didn't find a great comparison on initial search.

(I've read Matt's PR above)
